participant_1.background:
I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.
I enjoy writing poetry to express my emotions and cope with the challenges I've faced.
i have only one child.
i am in between classes.

participant_2.background:
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
i would travel the world if i could.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
I'm doing good! I'm just cleaning up the house a bit. How about you?
I'm in between classes right now, so I'm just relaxing and catching up on some work.
That sounds like a good way to spend your time. What do you do for work?
I'm a chef, so I love to cook and come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
That's awesome! I love kale, too. I grow it in my garden every summer.
Really? That's so cool! I've always wanted to grow my own vegetables, but I don't have a garden.
It's not too hard, and it's really rewarding. You should give it a try!
I might just do that! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! So, what kind of poetry do you write?
I write all different kinds of poetry, but I mostly write about my emotions and experiences.
That's really interesting. I've never really been into poetry, but I might have to give it a try.
You should! It's a great way to express yourself.
